title: Stretch Tall!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Karin-chan, Karin-chaaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hnngh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Let’s do the radio calisthenics~! You promised yesterday~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Mmnn.... Zzz....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Lanzhu-chan is working hard to collect these stickers~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Stickers....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Glittering panda stickers~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hmnn, I guess it can’t be helped.... Fwaaah....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, good morning, Karin-chan! Alright, let’s go~, the radio calisthenics is about to begin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Geez, you guys are too energetic in the morning.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
